title: 690 - Promfree | Stan Chronicles Ep 5
description:
Put on your dancing shoes and hang your streams for a night under the stars. Attend a dream prom where you don’t need a date, just joy.

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:00)


Tonight’s episode is sponsored by Brooklinen, luxury bedding, at amazing prices. You have to try these sheets today! **Goto http://www.brooklinen.com where there is anexclusive offer **just for Sleep With Me listeners.

  • Get $20 off AND free shipping when you use promo code [WITHME] at http://www.brooklinen.com.

  • Brooklinen is SO confident that they offer a risk-free 60-night satisfaction guarantee and a lifetime warranty on all of their sheets and comforters! 


Tonight’s episode is sponsored by Casper.Get $50 toward select mattresses by visiting http://www.casper.com/sleepwith and using “sleepwith”at checkout. Terms and Conditions apply. You can be sure of your purchase with Casper’s 100 night risk-free, sleep-on-it trial.
